channel.title: on Catastrophic Failures by Chris
channel.description: Recent content in on Catastrophic Failures by Chris

item.title: Awful At Rust: Using AWS with Rusoto
item.description: Hi, I’m Chris and I’m awful at Rust. I recently started learning and using Rust. For my first real project, I wanted to build a tool for sending and receiving some AWS SQS messages. Amazon recently announced support for Rust through an official SDK, but at the time of this writing it is in early alpha stages and only supports a select set of services, none of which I’m familiar. I’m excited to see the support from Amazon and look forward to using it in the future, but I want to use AWS now.
